definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
Mohamed ElBaradei (1942-), Director of International Atomic Energy Agency 1997-2009 and Nobel Peace Prize laureate
Kennedy (name)/J.F. Kennedy (1917-1963), US Democrat politician, president 1961-1963
Kennedy space center, Cape Canaveral 卡納維拉爾角|卡纳维拉尔角[Ka3 na4 wei2 la1 er3 jiao3], Florida
pinyin: Ken3 ni2 di2 Hang2 tian1 Zhong1 xin1

definition: Mogadishu, Indian ocean seaport and capital of Somalia
disco/night club/abbr. for 迪斯科廳|迪斯科厅

sentences.english: Did you mean Narendra Modi, Gujarat Chief Minister?
sentences.chinese: 您說到吉拉特邦首席部長，納倫德拉莫迪？

sentences.english: Meet Grady, a twenty-nine year old construction worker.
sentences.chinese: 米特格雷迪，一個二十九歲的建築工人。

sentences.english: Give a shout for Platty, Hughesy, Bouldy and Alex.
sentences.chinese: 爲普拉迪，曉仕，保迪和阿歷斯而歡呼吧。

sentences.english: Mr Dedalus said. I was only vamping, man.
sentences.chinese: 迪達勒斯先生說，“夥計，我不過是湊湊熱鬧。”

sentences.english: While one man played the didgeridoo, his two friends sang.
sentences.chinese: 一人吹着迪吉里杜木管，他的兩個朋友則唱歌。

sentences.english: Congratulations on coming this far in your Fundi course.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜您學習了這麼多方迪課程。

sentences.english: Eight tiered, 16th century stone bridge called Athpula in Lodi Gardens.
sentences.chinese: 羅迪公園裏建於16世紀的八墩石橋。

sentences.english: The ball Giggsy crossed for Ronaldo was a classic.
sentences.chinese: 吉格斯傳給克里斯迪亞諾的球堪稱經典。

sentences.english: Browse or Buy our Dickies Workwear Today.
sentences.chinese: 瀏覽或購買我們的迪基斯工作服今天。

sentences.english: But if he then beat Clottey, that would be great.
sentences.chinese: 然而如果他擊敗了克羅迪，那他就偉大了。

sentences.english: Delia's followers are thinking inside the box this Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 迪莉婭的追隨者們正在思考這個聖誕節節禮。

sentences.english: The poem reads like a translation.
sentences.chinese: 他們出版了萊奧帕爾迪詩歌的譯文。

sentences.english: Removing Duette blinds is very simple and only requires a drill with a Phillips drill bit.
sentences.chinese: 卸下迪埃特百葉窗非常簡單，只需要一個十字鑽頭鑽。

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

sentences.english: Why, Discher wondered, don't heart muscle cells then replace the scar tissue?
sentences.chinese: 迪斯凱爾想知道，爲什麼心肌細胞不取代疤痕組織呢？

sentences.english: And it's more than just saying, "Anybody here form Dubuque?"
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅是說一句，“有誰是從迪比克來的嗎？”

definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
